# variable and constants

declaring variables
- let
 * int, float, boolean, string
 * camalcase - __accountNumber__
 * private - _accountNumber
 * automatically generated - $accountNumber
 * `` __proto__`` - non standard features
- const
 * fixed
- var
 * variable
naming variables
common error variables
